# Copilot Instructions

Follow the common coding standards defined in `.standards/common-standards.md`.

## Quick Reference

NestJS: strict TS, validator DTOs, Logger, HTTP codes, exceptions, tests, DI, ValidationPipe, logging. Security: no sensitive logs, validate inputs, proper errors. Quality: ESLint, Prettier, 80%+ coverage, tests pass.

**Full standards**: See `.standards/common-standards.md`
